displayProperties.description: “The Sindu inhabited gas giants in the spinward marches. They refused my invitation at first. As with all things, they came to see things my way.” —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Helm of the Ace-Defiant

displayProperties.description: “The Sindu fly like surgeons operate. And the Ace-Defiants are the best among them. Only one Shadowed me.” —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Grips of the Ace-Defiant

displayProperties.description: “The Ace-Defiant burned his mind to fly my golden ship. Being a Loyalist costs you. Being a Shadow costs dearly.” —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Vest of the Ace-Defiant

displayProperties.description: “We armed the Sindu with a fleet of golden ships. Their interceptors are a shield for the Leviathan, as the Shadows are my sword.” —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Boots of the Ace-Defiant

displayProperties.description: “With the death of the Ace-Defiant, the Leviathan is without a master helmsman. If I must wait another millennium for a replacement, I shall.” —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Shadow's Cloak

displayProperties.description: The next time we meet.
displayProperties.name: Mask of the Emperor's Agent

displayProperties.description: You left me with nothing, but now I have everything.
displayProperties.name: Gloves of the Emperor's Agent

displayProperties.description: You don't realize that I'm all around you.
displayProperties.name: Vest of the Emperor's Agent

displayProperties.description: You're a difficult one to find.
displayProperties.name: Boots of the Emperor's Agent

displayProperties.description: My gift to the Hunter with Ghaul's cunning.

3117822376.sourceString: Source: Leviathan, Eater of Worlds raid lair.

displayProperties.description: "The Black Armory celebrates who we are. Who we all are. We design all of our gear after our traditions. They carry our legacy." —Y. Satou
displayProperties.name: Bladesmith's Memory Mask

1958061230.sourceString: Source: Found in the "Scourge of the Past" raid.

displayProperties.description: "Tradition binds us. It keeps us in line. It is the foundation of family, and the Black Armory is a family." —Y. Satou
displayProperties.name: Bladesmith's Memory Grips

1006209153.sourceString: Source: Found in the "Scourge of the Past" raid.

displayProperties.description: "My mother always did her best to preserve our traditions, despite the world's best attempts to destroy them." —Y. Satou
displayProperties.name: Bladesmith's Memory Vest

210800719.sourceString: Source: Found in the "Scourge of the Past" raid.

displayProperties.description: "Humanity deserves to be seen as they truly are. To not allow their heritage to be forgotten." —Y. Satou
displayProperties.name: Bladesmith's Memory Strides

1090481447.sourceString: Source: Found in the "Scourge of the Past" raid.

displayProperties.description: "We hold onto traditions like memories. They define us. They remind us of those we've lost." —Y. Satou
displayProperties.name: Bladesmith's Memory Cloak

2934219888.sourceString: Source: Found in the "Scourge of the Past" raid.

displayProperties.description: "The athenaeum worlds lie before you. Everything from the Empire of old that was—and has been lost. You and I will rediscover them together. As true Cabal." —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Shadow's Mask

2173391412.sourceString: Acquired from the raid "Crown of Sorrow."

displayProperties.description: "With my knowledge of the future and all that you've seen and done… The silence borne of it… What can stop us at the end of all things?" —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Shadow's Grips

1936703287.sourceString: Acquired from the raid "Crown of Sorrow."

displayProperties.description: "Nothing. Nothing can stop us. You and I shall take back the pillars of existence from the lost athenaeum worlds." —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Shadow's Vest

2206749417.sourceString: Acquired from the raid "Crown of Sorrow."

displayProperties.description: "All that we've left in the athenaeum catalogs are suitable proxies for all the powers of this system. I've simply forgotten how to reach them. I'm not who I was. I need you." —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Shadow's Strides

704377325.sourceString: Acquired from the raid "Crown of Sorrow."

displayProperties.description: "When we find my lost worlds and open their knowledge to this system, the end will find us. At last—the right to be last." —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Penumbral Cloak

displayProperties.description: The galaxy feels smaller now. It's not a pleasant feeling.
displayProperties.name: Scorched Hunter Mask

2914739609.sourceString: Source: Earned over the course of the Red War campaign.

displayProperties.description: These grips were much more useful with the Traveler's Light.
displayProperties.name: Scorched Hunter Grips

2611292590.sourceString: Source: Earned over the course of the Red War campaign.

displayProperties.description: Every journey has its ups and downs. That's what you keep telling yourself, at least.
displayProperties.name: Scorched Hunter Vest

3156993578.sourceString: Source: Earned over the course of the Red War campaign.

displayProperties.description: Survival now depends on your ability to outrun the enemy.
displayProperties.name: Scorched Hunter Strides

3849429964.sourceString: Source: Earned over the course of the Red War campaign.

displayProperties.description: Before, you wouldn't have been caught dead with a tattered cloak. But that was before.
displayProperties.name: Scorched Hunter Cloak

1896744061.sourceString: Source: Earned over the course of the Red War campaign.

displayProperties.description: Keep your wits about you. They're all you have left.
displayProperties.name: Refugee Mask

displayProperties.description: The Hunter has become the hunted.
displayProperties.name: Refugee Gloves

displayProperties.description: Well, you've looked better. But hey, you've looked worse.
displayProperties.name: Refugee Vest

displayProperties.description: Keep it moving. Swift of foot and long of stride.
displayProperties.name: Refugee Boots

displayProperties.description: Time to embrace humbleness.
displayProperties.name: Refugee Cloak

displayProperties.description: The wilds are your home. Let your instincts guide you.
displayProperties.name: Wastelander Mask

displayProperties.description: Let the thrill of the hunt drive you. That, and fear of extinction.
displayProperties.name: Wastelander Wraps

displayProperties.description: Hunters are born survivors.
displayProperties.name: Wastelander Vest

displayProperties.description: Strong legs are a Hunter's best asset.  That, and high-velocity ammo.
displayProperties.name: Wastelander Boots

displayProperties.description: The City never defined you. Make your own path.
displayProperties.name: Renegade Hood

displayProperties.description: "Without Light to sustain it, this body of mine cannot make the pilgrimage to the Shard. But you can." —Tyra Karn
displayProperties.name: Dreamer's Cloak

2325722862.sourceString: Source: Earned over the course of the Red War campaign.

displayProperties.description: There are some helmets that will change your tactics forever. This is just a helmet.
displayProperties.name: Makeshift Suit

displayProperties.description: When you pick up strange new firearms every day, sturdy gloves are a must.
displayProperties.name: Makeshift Suit

displayProperties.description: Hunters pooled their scavenged gear to build new field suits.
displayProperties.name: Makeshift Suit

displayProperties.description: The Makeshift Suit design is simple, flexible, and easy to encrypt into an engram for easy storage.
displayProperties.name: Makeshift Suit

displayProperties.description: Guardians have a range of skills, but—clearly—Hunters are the most… capable.
displayProperties.name: At Least It's a Cape

displayProperties.description: For ages, Guardians have visited new lands, seen the sights, and ransacked them for loot.
displayProperties.name: Scavenger Suit

displayProperties.description: "No, no, Guardians don't steal. We just… clean up after ourselves." —Kit Ali Ameir
displayProperties.name: Scavenger Suit

displayProperties.description: Some Hunters will offer you hope. Others just know how to track fresh water.
displayProperties.name: Scavenger Suit

displayProperties.description: When the City fell, humanity went into exile. Except the Hunters. They went home.
displayProperties.name: Scavenger Suit

displayProperties.description: Feel free to offer it for bandages and tourniquets.
displayProperties.name: Scavenger Cloak

displayProperties.description: Who was Kit Ali Ameir? How did she draw images of Cabal a century before first contact?
displayProperties.name: Kit Fox 1.5

displayProperties.description: Before the fight, prepare. In the fight, improvise. After the fight? Exaggerate.
displayProperties.name: Kit Fox 2.1

displayProperties.description: Finders, keepers.
displayProperties.name: Kit Fox 1.4

displayProperties.description: "It's not prophecy. Prophecy is for warlocks and windbiters. I call it... seeing at a distance." —Kit Ali Ameir
displayProperties.name: Kit Fox 1.1

displayProperties.description: You've got to choose when to be a lion and when to be a fox. Friend, these are fox days.
displayProperties.name: Sly Cloak

displayProperties.description: Hunters found the bounty board in London's ruins. They took every target, even without pay.
displayProperties.name: Mechanik 1.2

displayProperties.description: "The old debts don't matter anymore. We've got a bigger score to settle." —Shiro-4
displayProperties.name: Mechanik 1.1

displayProperties.description: Alone or in packs, Hunters scour worlds for the most dangerous and prestigious game.
displayProperties.name: Mechanik 2.1

displayProperties.description: "Get out of here, stalker." — Traditional farewell in the Appalachian Dead Zone
displayProperties.name: Mechanik 1.1

displayProperties.description: "Don't notch your cloak for every bounty. You'll run out of cloak." —Marcus Ren
displayProperties.name: Hood of Tallies

displayProperties.description: Look now, with sullen eyes, to those long lost worlds no one has ever walked.
displayProperties.name: Shadow Specter

displayProperties.description: Cling to this world, oh departed friend, that its wonders will never slip your grasp.
displayProperties.name: Shadow Specter

displayProperties.description: Haunt the paths yet tread, that your wake may guide those brave enough to follow.
displayProperties.name: Shadow Specter

displayProperties.description: The other side of death is simply a new frontier. Tame it.
displayProperties.name: Shadow Specter

displayProperties.description: Light as the breeze that carries the day.
displayProperties.name: Shadow Specter

displayProperties.description: …laughs at the horizon—ever changing, ever new.
displayProperties.name: The Outlander's Cover

displayProperties.description: …gathers the treasures others can't reach.
displayProperties.name: The Outlander's Grip

displayProperties.description: …beats with each new step into the beyond.
displayProperties.name: The Outlander's Heart

displayProperties.description: …always lead to new places.
displayProperties.name: The Outlander's Steps

displayProperties.description: …hides the sins of days forgotten and those yet to come.
displayProperties.name: The Outlander's Cloak

displayProperties.description: "Today, young Guardians, you will learn how to run a Cabal naval blockade. Both ways." —Unknown
displayProperties.name: War Mantis

displayProperties.description: The metamaterial that coats the gauntlet repels Cabal pressure gel. Keep it clean.
displayProperties.name: War Mantis

displayProperties.description: Wartime necessity simplifies most hardware. But Hunter armor becomes more…personal.
displayProperties.name: War Mantis

displayProperties.description: "The more we danced, the more the Cabal battlenet lit up with requests for intelligence…" —Unknown
displayProperties.name: War Mantis

displayProperties.description: "…and that's how we mapped the entire Cabal warnet by shredding the dance floor." —Unknown
displayProperties.name: War Mantis Cloak

displayProperties.description: KING TYRANUS: Revived by science, tragic king Tyranus Rex eats his father Hamalco.
displayProperties.name: Mythos Hack 4.1

displayProperties.description: PARADISE LOST: A group of castaways seek to overthrow the divine order.
displayProperties.name: Mythos Hack 4.1

displayProperties.description: LUSIADS: A sea captain journeys to India to avenge his brother Vali, but finds peace.
displayProperties.name: Mythos Hack 4.1

displayProperties.description: ENUMA ELIS: The god Marduk seeks a musician to compose for his beloved, Elise.
displayProperties.name: Mythos Hack 4.1

displayProperties.description: "In time all this will be myth, confused and glorious. The details matter less than those who tell it."
displayProperties.name: Cloak of Retelling

displayProperties.description: "They're powered by that Hive rock you got me! Sloane gave me permission once I explained the voltmeter readings." —Amanda Holliday
displayProperties.name: Songbreaker Grips

942424421.sourceString: Source: Adventure "Siren Song" on Saturn's moon, Titan.

displayProperties.description: "I dunno what's more fun: Stealing enemy vehicles, or blowing them up." —Hawthorne
displayProperties.name: Gearhead Grips

942424420.sourceString: Source: Adventure "Unsafe at Any Speed" in the European Dead Zone.

displayProperties.description: "Another successful mission accomplished, Captain!" —Failsafe
displayProperties.name: Shieldbreaker Vest

displayProperties.description: "Your work today was more than acceptable. It was adequate." —Asher Mir
displayProperties.name: Mindbreaker Boots

displayProperties.description: "I've seen experiments like this before. My crew.... I don't want to talk about it." —Failsafe
displayProperties.name: Unethical Experiments Cloak

displayProperties.description: "You made the right choice. I think. Either way, I'm on your side." —Ghost
displayProperties.name: Orobas Vectura Cloak

3879141792.sourceString: Source: Adventure "Red Legion, Black Oil" in the European Dead Zone.

displayProperties.description: "Let us describe the art of mapping a dream. First, all former dreams must be crushed. This makes the ink with which we draw." —The Book of Departures, Canto III
displayProperties.name: Anti-Extinction Mask

1940562340.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Arach Jalaal.

displayProperties.description: "As birds are touched by a sudden and invisible instinct to fly to safer ground, so are we." —The Book of Departures, Canto VII
displayProperties.name: Anti-Extinction Grasps

2772419047.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Arach Jalaal.

displayProperties.description: "Our fundamental principle, to which all the Arachs must swear, is emigration." —The Book of Departures, Canto I
displayProperties.name: Anti-Extinction Vest

1452912697.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Arach Jalaal.

displayProperties.description: "Some Arachs turn from their path and embrace the Earth as home. One and all, they are bitterly disappointed." —The Book of Departures, Canto XII
displayProperties.name: Anti-Extinction Legs

1534973309.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Arach Jalaal.

displayProperties.description: "One day an Arach, triumphant, will oversee a mass departure. The Arach's purpose thus turns from persuasion to selection. Our future home must be chosen with care." —The Book of Departures, Canto II
displayProperties.name: Stella Incognita Cloak

4176331878.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Arach Jalaal.

displayProperties.description: Complete a Nightfall strike wearing full Dead Orbit armor and while pledged to that faction to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Anti-Extinction Mask, Helm, and Hood.
displayProperties.name: Extinction Orbit Ornament

displayProperties.description: Complete Lost Sectors off Earth while pledged to Dead Orbit to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Anti-Extinction Grasps, Gauntlets, and Gloves.
displayProperties.name: Extinction Orbit Ornament

displayProperties.description: Get precision kills while pledged to Dead Orbit to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Anti-Extinction Vest, Plate, and Robes.
displayProperties.name: Extinction Orbit Ornament

displayProperties.description: Get melee kills off Earth while pledged to Dead Orbit to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Anti-Extinction Legs, Greaves, and Boots.
displayProperties.name: Extinction Orbit Ornament

displayProperties.description: Claim Dead Orbit reward engrams in Season 2 to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Stella Incognita Cloak, Mark, and Bond.
displayProperties.name: Extinction Orbit Ornament

displayProperties.description: Spend Renown by looting a Lost Sector cache while pledged to Dead Orbit.
displayProperties.name: Arach's Chosen Casque

displayProperties.description: Get Hive kills using fully charged melee abilities while pledged to Dead Orbit.
displayProperties.name: Arach's Chosen Grips

displayProperties.description: Get multikills with Supers while wearing full Dead Orbit Anti-Extinction armor and pledged to Dead Orbit.
displayProperties.name: Arach's Chosen Vestments

displayProperties.description: Earn Renown with full Dead Orbit Anti-Extinction armor equipped and while pledged to Dead Orbit.
displayProperties.name: Arach's Chosen Flight

displayProperties.description: While pledged to Dead Orbit, complete the Methane Flush Lost Sector in Siren's Watch on Titan.
displayProperties.name: Cape of Last Departure

displayProperties.description: "It's not inevitable, is it? What I saw? Please say it's not." —RECORD 451-CHASM-7037
displayProperties.name: Simulator Mask

3274190768.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Lakshmi-2.

displayProperties.description: "Visualization was unexpectedly drawn toward images suggestive of the past. Experiment terminated at lead investigator's frantic demand." —RECORD 457-CHASM-7002
displayProperties.name: Simulator Grips

3170443739.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Lakshmi-2.

displayProperties.description: "Flames. Ice. Floods. Whirlwinds. Earthquakes. Eruptions. Destruction and despair." —RECORD 458-CHASM-7121
displayProperties.name: Simulator Vest

1362672877.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Lakshmi-2.

displayProperties.description: "I saw her! I saw her! No, send me back, I saw her!" —RECORD 453-CHASM-7377
displayProperties.name: Simulator Boots

3705313697.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Lakshmi-2.

displayProperties.description: "I see six armies, locked in battle, across far systems. Now I see four armies. And now I see one." —RECORD 579-CHASM-3360
displayProperties.name: Entanglement Cloak

2892644258.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Lakshmi-2.

displayProperties.description: Complete a Nightfall strike wearing full FWC armor and while pledged to that faction to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Simulator Mask, Helm, and Hood.
displayProperties.name: War Simulator Ornament

displayProperties.description: Complete public events while pledged to FWC to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Simulator Grips, Gauntlets, and Gloves.
displayProperties.name: War Simulator Ornament

displayProperties.description: Get Power weapon kills while pledged to FWC to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Simulator Vest, Plate, and Robes.
displayProperties.name: War Simulator Ornament

displayProperties.description: Get grenade kills in strikes while pledged to FWC to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Simulator Boots, Greaves, and Legs.
displayProperties.name: War Simulator Ornament

displayProperties.description: Claim Future War Cult reward engrams in Season 2 to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Entanglement Cloak, Mark, and Bond.
displayProperties.name: War Simulator Ornament

displayProperties.description: Spend Renown by looting a Lost Sector cache while pledged to Future War Cult.
displayProperties.name: Superior's Vision Cowl

displayProperties.description: Eliminate Vex with the Golden Gun while pledged to Future War Cult.
displayProperties.name: Superior's Vision Grips

displayProperties.name: Superior's Vision Cuirass

displayProperties.description: "Above all, Executors must cultivate perceptiveness, for without this, kings and queens might walk before our faces and we would not see." —Laws of the Executors, Vol. 3
displayProperties.name: Sovereign Mask

903252957.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Executor Hideo.

displayProperties.description: "With stout and unfailing arm, Executors shall defend the principles of monarchy to all who challenge them." —Laws of the Executors, Vol. 6
displayProperties.name: Sovereign Grips

1543192218.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Executor Hideo.

displayProperties.description: "In seeking a true leader, the Executor must test the heart of each candidate, sifting through the weak, foolish, and evil for the good." —Laws of the Executors, Vol. 13
displayProperties.name: Sovereign Vest

681290262.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Executor Hideo.

displayProperties.description: "With steadfast pace and upright bearing, we and those who follow us shall prevail." —Laws of the Executors, Vol. 9
displayProperties.name: Sovereign Boots

4196419544.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Executor Hideo.

displayProperties.description: "When the dream is fulfilled and the day has come to crown a leader, spectacle and pomp are fitting. Spend lavishly." —Laws of the Executors, Vol. 1
displayProperties.name: Coronation Cloak

1951882497.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Executor Hideo.

displayProperties.description: Complete a Nightfall strike wearing full New Monarchy armor and while pledged to that faction to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Sovereign Mask, Helm, and Hood.

displayProperties.description: Complete patrols in the EDZ while pledged to New Monarchy to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Sovereign Grips, Gauntlets, and Gloves.
displayProperties.name: Sovereign Lion Ornament

displayProperties.description: Create Orbs of Light while pledged to New Monarchy to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Sovereign Vest, Plate, and Robes.
displayProperties.name: Sovereign Lion Ornament

displayProperties.description: Get Super kills in the EDZ while pledged to New Monarchy to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Sovereign Boots, Greaves, and Legs.
displayProperties.name: Sovereign Lion Ornament

displayProperties.description: Claim New Monarchy reward engrams during Season 2 to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Coronation Cloak, Mark, and Bond.
displayProperties.name: Sovereign Lion Ornament

displayProperties.description: Spend Renown by looting a Lost Sector cache while pledged to New Monarchy.
displayProperties.name: Executor's Will Casque

displayProperties.description: Defeat Cabal Centurions while pledged to New Monarchy.
displayProperties.name: Executor's Will Grips

displayProperties.description: Open chests in the EDZ with full New Monarchy Sovereign armor equipped and while pledged to New Monarchy.
displayProperties.name: Executor's Will Vest

displayProperties.description: Earn Renown with full New Monarchy Sovereign armor equipped and while pledged to New Monarchy.
displayProperties.name: Executor's Will Strides

displayProperties.description: While pledged to New Monarchy, complete the Drain Lost Sector in the EDZ's Outskirts.
displayProperties.name: Cape of the Royal

displayProperties.description: From high atop humanity we watch.
displayProperties.name: Mask of Optimacy

displayProperties.description: You hold the means to control worlds.
displayProperties.name: Arms of Optimacy

displayProperties.description: Your true worth has at last been made manifest.
displayProperties.name: Vest of Optimacy

displayProperties.description: All that tread below will learn that we, the Optimacy, dwell above.
displayProperties.name: Legs of Optimacy

displayProperties.description: Has this wealth found you or have you found it?
displayProperties.name: Cloak of Optimacy

displayProperties.description: "The Vex don't really want to kill you. It's just that one of the by-products of conversion is death. Shame, huh?" —Sagira
displayProperties.name: Omega Mechanos Mask

displayProperties.description: "They want to turn you into data sets. Strip away everything about you that doesn't 'compute' for them." —Sagira
displayProperties.name: Omega Mechanos Grasps

displayProperties.description: "And a version of you would still be alive in a Vex simulation somewhere. So it's only sort of like death, really." —Sagira
displayProperties.name: Omega Mechanos Vest

displayProperties.description: "And Ghosts? I don't think they really understand what we are. Light is pretty hard to simulate. Paracausality and all that." —Sagira
displayProperties.name: Omega Mechanos Strides

displayProperties.description: "Gotta wonder what happened to make the Vex like this, right? I mean, the Vex couldn't have come from nowhere." —Sagira
displayProperties.name: Omega Mechanos Cloak

displayProperties.description: "Let the outside mirror what is found on the inside."
displayProperties.name: Qiao's Grin

displayProperties.description: "Always reach for understanding and compassion."
displayProperties.name: Qiao's Care

displayProperties.description: "Be aware at all times of what drives those around you."
displayProperties.name: Qiao's Heart

displayProperties.description: "Walk in peace, and know that there can be no danger in wisdom."
displayProperties.name: Qiao's Strides

displayProperties.description: "Bind yourself with compassion and knowledge."
displayProperties.name: Qiao's Passing

displayProperties.description: "We are the last city of Humans. We greet each new year with joy and thanksgiving." —Tyra Karn
displayProperties.name: Winterhart Mask

displayProperties.description: "No light ever truly goes out." —Lady Jolder
displayProperties.name: Winterhart Grips

displayProperties.description: "The nights are long and cold. We must take care of each other." —Tyra Karn
displayProperties.name: Winterhart Vest

displayProperties.description: "We don't have much, but what we have we share. If we don't, we will die." —Tyra Karn
displayProperties.name: Winterhart Strides

displayProperties.description: "The sun does arise, and make happy the skies." —Pre-Golden Age poetry
displayProperties.name: Winterhart Cloak

displayProperties.description: It's cold out there.

displayProperties.name: Vanguard Dare Casque

displayProperties.description: "I'm glad you all had him. But he was ours first." —Ghost of Shiro-4
displayProperties.name: Vanguard Dare Grips

displayProperties.description: "Hunters never like Vanguard duty. Almost never. But Andal took it real serious. I don't think Shiro's forgiven him for it."

displayProperties.description: Course you gotta jack their stuff. That's how you show 'em you love 'em, Andal. Now lemme show you around. —Tallulah "Tallu" Fairwind

displayProperties.description: "I knew my name the instant my Ghost found me." —Therin Vai
displayProperties.name: Neoteric Kiyot Cloak

1943524096.sourceString: Source: Complete activities in the Dreaming City.

displayProperties.description: "For starlight was my mother, and my father was the dark." —Queen Mara Sov
displayProperties.name: Reverie Dawn Grasps

displayProperties.description: "There is a place where we can remember who we are." —Imogen Rife

2907189597.sourceString: Source: Complete activities in the Dreaming City.

displayProperties.description: "What has been awoken can slumber no more." —Techeun Kalli
displayProperties.name: Reverie Dawn Strides

3438072081.sourceString: Source: Complete activities in the Dreaming City.

displayProperties.description: "Perhaps it was not the correct choice. But it was the right choice." —Yasmin Eld
displayProperties.name: Reverie Dawn Cloak

152639570.sourceString: Source: Complete activities in the Dreaming City.

displayProperties.name: Scatterhorn Mask

26036745.sourceString: Source: Complete activities and earn rank-up packages on the Tangled Shore.

displayProperties.description: "That's no ordinary dust. You're standing on the pulverized remnants of 1 Ceres." —Corsair Anzani Lyle
displayProperties.name: Scatterhorn Grasps

4022676830.sourceString: Source: Complete activities and earn rank-up packages on the Tangled Shore.

displayProperties.description: "Was Wolf once. Still Wolf after Scatter, but… different. Then Queen's. Wolf again. Bannerless. Then Spider's." —Avrok
displayProperties.name: Scatterhorn Vest

2438086330.sourceString: Source: Complete activities and earn rank-up packages on the Tangled Shore.

displayProperties.description: "The Awoken have been bleeding territories for years now. Tangled Shore was just the first to slip between the cracks." —The Spider
displayProperties.name: Scatterhorn Strides

960727132.sourceString: Source: Complete activities and earn rank-up packages on the Tangled Shore.

displayProperties.description: "Lost things have a way of washing up on the Tangled Shore." —The Spider

displayProperties.description: "I used some of my own code to program this armor! But if you die, it's your fault. Not mine." —Failsafe
displayProperties.name: Exodus Down Mask

3452801174.sourceString: Acquired from the Menagerie aboard the Leviathan with the requisite combination of runes in the Chalice of Opulence.

displayProperties.name: Exodus Down Grips

4148568681.sourceString: Acquired from the Menagerie aboard the Leviathan with the requisite combination of runes in the Chalice of Opulence.

displayProperties.name: Exodus Down Vest

413219239.sourceString: Acquired from the Menagerie aboard the Leviathan with the requisite combination of runes in the Chalice of Opulence.

displayProperties.description: "We might be stopping at Nessus after all. We just lost the starboard engine." —Chief Eng. Kaoru Zuykova
displayProperties.name: Exodus Down Strides

displayProperties.description: This Guardian armor was repurposed from old Exodus Black crew flight suits.

displayProperties.description: "D.E.C. means you don't have to travel alone. Unless you want to." —D.E.C., 1st Brother to Unknown
displayProperties.name: Dead End Cure 2.1

984105191.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: "The path don't end. You do." —D.E.C. slogan
displayProperties.name: Dead End Cure 2.1

1087852252.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: "There's no dead ends, fella." —D.E.C., 1st Sister to Unknown
displayProperties.name: Dead End Cure 2.1

2849471332.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: "We kill miles." —D.E.C. slogan
displayProperties.name: Dead End Cure 2.1

1851684746.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: Worn by 1st Brothers and Sisters of the Dead End Cure, a notorious posse of itinerant Hunters.
displayProperties.name: Far Gone Hood

126052155.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: "Be mindful of the countless miles ahead. They will test even the bravest among us." —The Speaker
displayProperties.name: Road Complex AA1

2952102148.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: "An adventurer's spirit is a tool so few possess. Own it. Enjoy it." —The Speaker
displayProperties.name: Road Complex AA1

3784062023.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: "Travel far and travel wide, and know that you are always welcome home." —The Speaker
displayProperties.name: Road Complex AA1

2267820569.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: "The many roads traveled have led to here… to now. Do not stop." —The Speaker
displayProperties.name: Road Complex AA1

2588089821.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: An honored gift, given to those who seek the farthest edges of maps yet written.

696169286.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: Remember this place when new horizons call.
displayProperties.name: Errant Knight 1.0

1206672057.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: Take the lost by the hand and lead them ever here, ever home.
displayProperties.name: Errant Knight 1.0

903225038.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: The quickening beat is in step with your wanderer's stride.
displayProperties.name: Errant Knight 1.0

2961762762.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: Walk on, noble hero… all roads lead home.
displayProperties.name: Errant Knight 1.0

2099785708.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: No matter how far you travel, home is closer than you think.
displayProperties.name: A Cloak Called Home

1659936285.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: "I was at the Final Attempt. I saw a Guardian wield a gun that left molten gold in her wake. I ran and never looked back." —Avrok, trans. from Eliksni
displayProperties.name: Tangled Web Mask

2719847110.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: "The Kells are dead or mad. The era of Houses is over. So I came to the Shore." —Arrha, trans. from Eliksni
displayProperties.name: Tangled Web Grips

2347069593.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: "Let them have the Great Machine. They deserve it." —Mithrax, trans. from Eliksni
displayProperties.name: Tangled Web Vest

2303104439.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: "I was of kings. Then of exiles. Now I'm here. The Shore is bad… but everywhere else is worse." —Brivi, transl. from Eliksni
displayProperties.name: Tangled Web Strides

820179487.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: "In my company, the Ether flows." —The Spider
displayProperties.name: Tangled Web Cloak

1268439960.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: "There's a new player over on the Shore. He calls himself 'Crow.' As if trying to rub our prince's death in our faces." —Report from Paladin Hallam Fen
displayProperties.name: Prodigal Mask

325106747.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: "The Reef grieves for Uldren Sov, lost in the Taken War. He will be remembered as a voice for peace." —Paladin Devi Cassl
displayProperties.name: Prodigal Grasps

835459592.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: "Petra Venj, I formally request that you take the Queenship." —Paladin Leona Bryl
displayProperties.name: Prodigal Vest

3690101936.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: "Regent-Commander Petra Venj, if you take the Queenship, I will take my fleet and leave." —Paladin Kamala Rior
displayProperties.name: Prodigal Strides

3861181510.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: "It's from 'Paladin Oran.' 'Use less data, route electron notices forward over Uranus-Neptune divide." —Paladin Hallam Fen
displayProperties.name: Prodigal Cloak

2160130559.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: Strange treasures wash up on the Shore.
displayProperties.name: Nea-Thonis Breather

318295528.sourceString: Source: Eliminate all Barons on the Tangled Shore.

displayProperties.description: "They gave us nothing… so we'll take everything." —Elykris, transl. from Eliksni
displayProperties.name: Scorned Baron Vest

848048725.sourceString: Source: Eliminate all Barons on the Tangled Shore.

displayProperties.description: "Hey… take me with you." —Cayde-6
displayProperties.name: Memory of Cayde Cloak

1841136266.sourceString: Source: Earned over the course of the Forsaken campaign.

displayProperties.description: "We do not trust what you call the Light, but certain times call for unlikely allies." —Ada-1
displayProperties.name: Woven Firesmith Mask

displayProperties.description: "Think what you will, I am merely a seamstress of demise." —Ada-1
displayProperties.name: Woven Firesmith Grips

displayProperties.description: "Every possibility must be considered." —Ada-1
displayProperties.name: Woven Firesmith Vest

displayProperties.description: "The Black Armory represents the ingenuity and tenacity of humanity. We do not bend easily, and we will not surrender our home while drawing breath." —Ada-1
displayProperties.name: Woven Firesmith Boots

displayProperties.description: "As long as we have someone to protect, the only option is to keep fighting." —Ada-1
displayProperties.name: Woven Firesmith Cape

displayProperties.description: "I have foreseen the victories that your cunning shall win in my name. Over and over." —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Opulent Stalker Mask

displayProperties.description: "I have foreseen the work that will bring this system together. I'll need your cunning." —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Opulent Stalker Grips

displayProperties.description: "I have foreseen what must fall so the Empire may rise. Your mastery of silent slaughter shall make true Cabal of us all." —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Opulent Stalker Vest

displayProperties.description: "I have foreseen the apex of your slaying potential. Should you wish it, this system shall die—from the inside—and make way for what's coming. O champion mine." —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Opulent Stalker Strides

displayProperties.description: "I have foreseen the end of all things. The novenary, the Awoken Queen, the sad, strange little man on his rickety boat. They believe they've seen the same. What they don't know shall destroy them." —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Opulent Stalker Cloak

displayProperties.description: "That last flare burned my engines out. Holliday's mad at me." —Ariadne Gris
displayProperties.name: Icarus Drifter Mask

3727947294.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: "Bet I can get to 15-6-6 Icarus before you can!" —Tallu Fairwind
displayProperties.name: Icarus Drifter Grips

2781318385.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: "You wouldn't believe the solar flare I caught the other day. Rode it halfway to Venus." —Blue Boaz
displayProperties.name: Icarus Drifter Vest

2374910879.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: "Just remember, post-crash Ghost rez in a vacuum can be, ah… complicated. So try not to die."  —Shun Endo
displayProperties.name: Icarus Drifter Legs

displayProperties.description:
"Don't forget who has the best Icarus–Daedalus time."

"You did it at closest approach! Doesn't count." "Does too!"
displayProperties.name: Icarus Drifter Cape

displayProperties.description: "Lord Kandak is 'considering' our appeal for more protection. Sidenote: When the Warlord took out his Ghost, Enitan fled the assembly. Why? She still claims amnesia." —Annals of the Saharan Contested Zone
displayProperties.name: Red Moon Phantom Grips

displayProperties.name: Red Moon Phantom Vest

displayProperties.name: Red Moon Phantom Steps

3180461956.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: “My planet was dead. The sky poisoned by war with an extrasolar enemy in a war that continued to rage. Then Calus came.” —Rull, Gun of Kaga Clipse
displayProperties.name: Mask of Rull

displayProperties.description: “Calus had won. But he took nothing from us. Instead he gave us everything we needed to end our perpetual war.” —Rull, Gun of Kaga Clipse.
displayProperties.name: Gauntlets of Rull

displayProperties.description: “Calus invited the Clipse to join his Loyalists. We refused, at first. So he sent a Shadow.” —Rull, Gun of Kaga Clipse.
displayProperties.name: Chassis of Rull

displayProperties.description: “Valus Nohr marched on our capital with a few thousand. For weeks we battered them. But the Valus. She broke us.” —Rull, Gun of Kaga Clipse.
displayProperties.name: Greaves of Rull

displayProperties.description: “Calus could not heal our air. My planet is still dying. But as long as I serve, I have hope.” —Rull, Gun of Kaga Clipse.
displayProperties.name: Shadow's Mark

displayProperties.description: Looking for a quiet place to watch the end of the world.
displayProperties.name: Helm of the Emperor's Champion

displayProperties.description: I will be the last light to go out at the party.
displayProperties.name: Gauntlets of the Emperor's Champion

displayProperties.description: What will we be to each other in the next life?
displayProperties.name: Cuirass of the Emperor's Champion

displayProperties.description: The chorus of regret must be deafening.
displayProperties.name: Greaves of the Emperor's Champion

displayProperties.description: A gift for the Titan with Ghaul's strength.
displayProperties.name: Mark of the Emperor's Champion

displayProperties.description: "I'm a Valus before I'm a 'Shadow.' But Calus is the empire's last, best hope. His plan is my plan." —Valus Nohr
displayProperties.name: Mask of Nohr

3227961791.sourceString: Source: Leviathan, Eater of Worlds raid lair.

displayProperties.description: "Do I miss my arm? I miss my empire. I would give everything to have it back. And I will." —Valus Nohr
displayProperties.name: Gauntlets of Nohr

3910680404.sourceString: Source: Leviathan, Eater of Worlds raid lair.

displayProperties.description: "Rull threatens, but he'll fall in line. The Clipse just don't like to lose." —Valus Nohr
displayProperties.name: Plate of Nohr

159246092.sourceString: Source: Leviathan, Eater of Worlds raid lair.

displayProperties.description: "Under Calus, this system will unite. And when the end comes, we'll be ready. All of us." —Valus Nohr
displayProperties.name: Greaves of Nohr

4095541538.sourceString: Source: Leviathan, Eater of Worlds raid lair.

displayProperties.description: "What Calus found at the black edge… when he brings it to light, there will be a reckoning unlike anything this galaxy has ever seen." —Valus Nohr
displayProperties.name: Mark of Nohr

1194013731.sourceString: Source: Leviathan, Eater of Worlds raid lair.

displayProperties.name: Eater of Worlds Ornament

displayProperties.name: Eater of Worlds Ornament

displayProperties.name: Eater of Worlds Ornament

displayProperties.name: Eater of Worlds Ornament

displayProperties.description: "You have truly grown fat from strength. Magnificent." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
displayProperties.name: Turris Shade Helm

593760981.sourceString: Source: Leviathan, Spire of Stars raid lair.

displayProperties.description: "Leaders. Elite infantry. Martial teachers. Your tribe would make stunning Shadows." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
displayProperties.name: Turris Shade Gauntlets

1812671858.sourceString: Source: Leviathan, Spire of Stars raid lair.

displayProperties.description: A little stronger. A more powerful stance. You are almost ready… to cast a Shadow. —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
displayProperties.name: Turris Shade Plate

2581491454.sourceString: Source: Leviathan, Spire of Stars raid lair.

displayProperties.description: "There has only ever been but a single Shadow from each people I've encountered. Yet there are so many Lights, and I have so little time…" —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal.
displayProperties.name: Turris Shade Greaves

3886927568.sourceString: Source: Leviathan, Spire of Stars raid lair.

displayProperties.description: "This serves as a message to all false Cabal that you have served me. They won't show it, but they fear you. And they should." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
displayProperties.name: Turris Shade Mark

3852186857.sourceString: Source: Leviathan, Spire of Stars raid lair.

displayProperties.name: Praetorian Ornament

displayProperties.name: Praetorian Ornament

displayProperties.description: I wish to be strategic.
displayProperties.name: Helm of the Great Hunt

displayProperties.description: I wish to be indestructible.
displayProperties.name: Gauntlets of the Great Hunt

displayProperties.description: I wish to be brave.
displayProperties.name: Plate of the Great Hunt

displayProperties.description: I wish to be immovable.
displayProperties.name: Greaves of the Great Hunt

displayProperties.description: I wish to be feared.
displayProperties.name: Mark of the Great Hunt

displayProperties.description: "Our forges will be state-of-the-art, delivering Black Armory weapons all over the solar system." —H. Rasmussen
displayProperties.name: Bulletsmith's Ire Helm

19426210.sourceString: Source: Found in the "Scourge of the Past" raid.

displayProperties.description: "We have an opportunity to change the world. The Black Armory has tools and solutions nobody else is even considering." —H. Rasmussen
displayProperties.name: Bulletsmith's Ire Gauntlets

318930381.sourceString: Source: Found in the "Scourge of the Past" raid.

displayProperties.description: "It's not enough, what we've built. The Black Armory can be bigger. Better. It will be. It has to be." —H. Rasmussen
displayProperties.name: Bulletsmith's Ire Plate

1492601371.sourceString: Source: Found in the "Scourge of the Past" raid.

displayProperties.description: "Their tools of war could be put to better use. The Armory has the ideas. They have the technology. Seems like a perfect match." —H. Rasmussen
displayProperties.name: Bulletsmith's Ire Greaves

1851983299.sourceString: Source: Found in the "Scourge of the Past" raid.

displayProperties.description: "Humanity will need protection. The Black Armory will provide." —H. Rasmussen
displayProperties.name: Bulletsmith's Ire Mark

3033018644.sourceString: Source: Found in the "Scourge of the Past" raid.

displayProperties.description: "The mysteries of the universe lie before you. Unresolved. Threatening. You and I will face them together. As true Cabal." —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Shadow's Helm

3660167648.sourceString: Acquired from the raid "Crown of Sorrow."

displayProperties.description: "With my knowledge of the future and all that you've seen and done… The victories borne of it… What can stop us at the end of all things?" —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Shadow's Gauntlets

3551197451.sourceString: Acquired from the raid "Crown of Sorrow."

displayProperties.description: "Nothing. Nothing can stop us. You and I shall uphold the pillars of existence until the end comes. And when it does…" —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Shadow's Plate

2221798077.sourceString: Acquired from the raid "Crown of Sorrow."

displayProperties.description: "…The future can't be fought. I know it. You know it. But that won't stop you from trying."  —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Shadow's Greaves

859645169.sourceString: Acquired from the raid "Crown of Sorrow."

displayProperties.description: "The key is to realize the future isn't an enemy to be fought. It's a friend to embrace. A closing of the circle. At last—the right to be last." —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Penumbral Mark

3762215346.sourceString: Acquired from the raid "Crown of Sorrow."

displayProperties.description: Every aspect of this helm has been compromised.
displayProperties.name: Wrecked Titan Helm

2085566469.sourceString: Source: Earned over the course of the Red War campaign.

displayProperties.description: Titans are taught to repair their armor after every battle. These gauntlets are a lost cause.
displayProperties.name: Wrecked Titan Gauntlets

2184013410.sourceString: Source: Earned over the course of the Red War campaign.

displayProperties.description: Not in a million years could you buff out all the dints in this breastplate.
displayProperties.name: Wrecked Titan Plate

3825974798.sourceString: Source: Earned over the course of the Red War campaign.

displayProperties.description: These boots are unaccustomed to retreat.
displayProperties.name: Wrecked Titan Greaves

4294622880.sourceString: Source: Earned over the course of the Red War campaign.

displayProperties.description: It is customary to shed a mark after victory or loss—to remind its finder of the history that came before.
displayProperties.name: Tattered Titan Mark

832833977.sourceString: Source: Earned over the course of the Red War campaign.

displayProperties.description: Keep your head up. You're still a Titan, after all.
displayProperties.name: Refugee Helm

displayProperties.description: These hands could once turn diamonds into dust.
displayProperties.name: Refugee Gloves

displayProperties.description: Titans honor their armor, no matter its strength.
displayProperties.name: Refugee Plate

displayProperties.description: When traveling far from the City, one must be prepared for all conditions and enemies.
displayProperties.name: Refugee Boots

displayProperties.description: Even without the Light, a Titan is a beacon of hope for any refugee.
displayProperties.name: Refugee Mark

displayProperties.description: The true test of a Titan's worth is how she endures defeat.
displayProperties.name: Renegade Helm

displayProperties.description: Those who founded the City braved the wilds of Earth with much less.
displayProperties.name: Renegade Gauntlets

displayProperties.description: Titans once challenged themselves to patrol the frontier with armor this weak.
displayProperties.name: Renegade Plate

displayProperties.description: The road to victory is long. May your legs never tire.
displayProperties.name: Renegade Greaves

displayProperties.description: Protect those who seek protection. Give them a home.
displayProperties.name: Mark of the Renegade

displayProperties.description: "Without Light to sustain it, this body of mine cannot make the pilgrimage to the Shard. But you can." —Tyra Karn
displayProperties.name: Dreamer's Mark

530312362.sourceString: Source: Earned over the course of the Red War campaign.

displayProperties.description: Fancy armor incorporates shock-absorbent padding. This ramshackle plate sure isn't fancy.
displayProperties.name: Fieldplate Type 10

displayProperties.description: When the Light was taken away, Vijaya Jain started crafting fieldplate. Lots of fieldplate.
displayProperties.name: Fieldplate Type 10

displayProperties.description: It'll take more than this to kill us.
displayProperties.name: Fieldplate Type 10

displayProperties.description: "Is it great armor? No. But at least there's plenty to go around." —Vijaya Jain
displayProperties.name: Fieldplate Type 10

displayProperties.description: Titan orders mark time in ages of battle. This was the twelfth—until the Cabal came.
displayProperties.name: Mark of the Longest Line

displayProperties.description: Firebreak Titans once fought to draw the battle away from home. Now home IS the battle.
displayProperties.name: Firebreak Field

displayProperties.description: To their shame, most of the wide-scattered Firebreak Order survived the City's fall.
displayProperties.name: Firebreak Field

displayProperties.description: We should never have let ourselves be cornered. We could have dispersed centuries ago.
displayProperties.name: Firebreak Field

displayProperties.description: Walls were never enough to guard us. We needed to strike first.
displayProperties.name: Firebreak Field

displayProperties.description: Callisto Yin carried the Fire Victorious out of the City on her burning mark.
displayProperties.name: Mark of the Fire

displayProperties.description: The Jaisalmer pattern in this helmet carries redundant transmitters, in case of cranial dislocation.
displayProperties.name: Fortress Field

displayProperties.description: "I see the first thing Titans rediscovered was the construction of huge shoulder plates." —A jealous Warlock, probably
displayProperties.name: Fortress Field

displayProperties.description: The Stoneborn, protectors of the City's walls, fell with the City. In memory this armor was made.
displayProperties.name: Fortress Field

displayProperties.description: I remember saying I was bored of the view from the Tower. I wish I'd shut my mouth.
displayProperties.name: Fortress Field

displayProperties.description: "Titans are trained to be a wall. But perhaps we must train ourselves to be something more." —Callisto Yin
displayProperties.name: Mark of the Golden Citadel

displayProperties.description: Vengeance may lead a good Titan from law down into fire.
displayProperties.name: Atgeir 2T1

displayProperties.description: If flexed at full strength, this gauntlet would tear itself asunder.
displayProperties.name: Atgeir 2T1

displayProperties.description: The plate's surface snaps into alignment when battle is near.
displayProperties.name: Atgeir 2T1

displayProperties.description: The legendary Njall let himself be burned rather than abandon his home.
displayProperties.name: Atgeir 2T1

displayProperties.description: In wars of ancient myth, the fire of great birds guarded the warriors below.
displayProperties.name: Atgeir Mark

displayProperties.description: Noble stand-ins for hope, when hope itself was long since gone." —Excerpt, "History of the Prime Guard"
displayProperties.name: RPC Valiant

displayProperties.description: The tragedy of the Prime Guard will be replaced by honored deeds yet done.” —Excerpt, "History of the Prime Guard"
displayProperties.name: RPC Valiant

displayProperties.description: "They were the first line, and the last." —Excerpt, "History of the Prime Guard"
displayProperties.name: RPC Valiant

displayProperties.description: As that forgotten Age lost its golden sheen, they stood defiant against the coming end. —Excerpt, "History of the Prime Guard"
displayProperties.name: RPC Valiant

displayProperties.description: "Stand before us, that you may be judged." —Unknown
displayProperties.name: Mark of Inquisition

displayProperties.description:
“No hard feelings?” —Unknown party

“What are feelings?” —Unknown Titan
displayProperties.name: Hardcase Helm

displayProperties.description: “Okay, then… Let's fight.” —Unknown Titan
displayProperties.name: Hardcase Brawlers

displayProperties.description: “At this point, it's a given… There will be pain.” —Unknown Titan
displayProperties.name: Hardcase Battleplate

displayProperties.description: “All ground gives way.” —Unknown Titan
displayProperties.name: Hardcase Stompers

displayProperties.description: "'Unknown Titan'? More like 'All Titans. Every single one.'" —Unknown Titan
displayProperties.name: Mark of Confrontation

displayProperties.description: The Psions who spied on Crucible training at Thuria were bemused by all the complaining.
displayProperties.name: Legion-Bane

displayProperties.description: Firm orders compel Legionaries to fight to the end—hoping for a lucky shot.
displayProperties.name: Legion-Bane

displayProperties.description: Titans brainstormed this high-end pattern for field make. We're not all punch-crazed lunks.
displayProperties.name: Legion-Bane

displayProperties.description: A Legionary packs thousands of slug rounds. A nimble Titan can survive every last one.
displayProperties.name: Legion-Bane

displayProperties.description: Strike down the Centurion. Leave the Legionaries to contemplate your indifference.
displayProperties.name: Black Shield Mark

displayProperties.description: Few Titans master all the disciplines of their Light. Those who do can switch in an instant.
displayProperties.name: Primal Siege Type 1

displayProperties.description: It's possible for an Exo to confuse their armor as part of their body: but then, y'see, they'll feel naked.
displayProperties.name: Primal Siege Type 1

displayProperties.description: Regardless of what we were, we inherently know what we must become.
displayProperties.name: Primal Siege Type 1

displayProperties.description: A Titan without a discipline is like a computer without programs.
displayProperties.name: Primal Siege Type 1

displayProperties.description: There comes a whisper in an ancient tongue: "You are worthy. Remember us."
displayProperties.name: Baseline Mark

displayProperties.description: "They're powered by that Hive rock you got me! Sloane gave me permission once I explained the voltmeter readings." —Amanda Holliday
displayProperties.name: Songbreaker Gauntlets

1073998665.sourceString: Source: Adventure "Siren Song" on Saturn's moon, Titan.

displayProperties.description: "I dunno what's more fun: Stealing enemy vehicles, or blowing them up." —Hawthorne
displayProperties.name: Gearhead Gauntlets

1073998664.sourceString: Source: Adventure "Unsafe at Any Speed" in the European Dead Zone.

displayProperties.description: "Another successful mission accomplished, Captain!" —Failsafe
displayProperties.name: Shieldbreaker Plate

displayProperties.description: "Your work today was more than acceptable. It was adequate." —Asher Mir
displayProperties.name: Mindbreaker Boots

displayProperties.description: "I've seen experiments like this before. My crew.... I don't want to talk about it." —Failsafe
displayProperties.name: Unethical Experiments Mark

displayProperties.description: "You made the right choice. I think. Either way, I'm on your side." —Ghost
displayProperties.name: Orobas Vectura Mark

2778741164.sourceString: Source: Adventure "Red Legion, Black Oil" in the European Dead Zone.

displayProperties.description: "Friends and families must be cast aside if they do not perceive the truth. Such ties bind us more tightly than gravity." —The Book of Departures, Canto III
displayProperties.name: Anti-Extinction Helm

1363382824.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Arach Jalaal.

displayProperties.description: "The instinct to migrate comes to many at once, without warning. Unlike birds, we must make preparations—we must make our own wings." —The Book of Departures, Canto VII
displayProperties.name: Anti-Extinction Gauntlets

685887123.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Arach Jalaal.

displayProperties.description: "To be selected as an Arach, one must have a clear vision of the future and its horrors." —The Book of Departures, Canto I
displayProperties.name: Anti-Extinction Plate

2185175701.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Arach Jalaal.

displayProperties.description: "Even for the faithless Arach, there is hope. While there is space on the ships, none shall be turned away." —The Book of Departures, Canto XII
displayProperties.name: Anti-Extinction Greaves

2868273529.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Arach Jalaal.

displayProperties.description: "In choosing the site of a new home, consider not only natural resources and environmental dangers, but also the fuel levels of your ships." —The Book of Departures, Canto II

displayProperties.description: "The face of war continues to change. In this timeline, Cabal. In another, Vex. And in this other one—we have no name for what we saw." —RECORD 614-CHASM-8299
displayProperties.name: Simulator Helm

3090413684.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Lakshmi-2.

displayProperties.description: "As in the other timelines we examined, where the simulation includes our intervention, the City survives. Where it does not, well..." —RECORD 116-CHASM-0064
displayProperties.name: Simulator Gauntlets

2853828727.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Lakshmi-2.

displayProperties.description: "In this vision we are victorious. In this vision also. And this one. And this." —RECORD 115-CHASM-8991
displayProperties.name: Simulator Plate

3514855977.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Lakshmi-2.

displayProperties.description: "I see the City, ruined and abandoned. I see no Traveler in the sky. The war is elsewhere. Let us find it." —RECORD 615-CHASM-2110
displayProperties.name: Simulator Greaves

1663079213.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Lakshmi-2.

displayProperties.description: "A hand, lying on the grass, in one future. A head in another. Components scattered across six visions. All identifiable. I agree. We cannot tell her. Take this off the—" —RECORD 784-CHASM-1016
displayProperties.name: Entanglement Mark

1943307862.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Lakshmi-2.

displayProperties.description: From high atop humanity we watch.
displayProperties.name: Helm of Optimacy

displayProperties.description: You hold the means to control worlds.
displayProperties.name: Arms of Optimacy

displayProperties.description: Your true worth has at last manifested.
displayProperties.name: Plate of Optimacy

displayProperties.description: All that tread below will learn that we, the Optimacy, dwell above.

displayProperties.description: Has this wealth found you or have you found it?

displayProperties.description: "The Vex don't really want to kill you. It's just that one of the by-products of conversion is death. Shame, huh?" —Sagira
displayProperties.name: Omega Mechanos Helm

displayProperties.description: "They want to turn you into data sets. Strip away everything about you that doesn't 'compute' for them." —Sagira
displayProperties.name: Omega Mechanos Gauntlets

displayProperties.description: "And a version of you would still be alive in a Vex simulation somewhere. So it's only sort of like death, really." —Sagira
displayProperties.name: Omega Mechanos Plate

displayProperties.description: "And Ghosts? I don't think they really understand what we are. Light is pretty hard to simulate. Paracausality and all that." —Sagira
displayProperties.name: Omega Mechanos Greaves

displayProperties.description: "Gotta wonder what happened to make the Vex like this, right? I mean, the Vex couldn't have come from nowhere." —Sagira
displayProperties.name: Omega Mechanos Mark

displayProperties.description: "Watch your people, mark their strengths, and be ready to call on them."
displayProperties.name: Hardy's Calm

displayProperties.description: "You know what I believe? Whatever I can get my hands on."
displayProperties.name: Hardy's Control

displayProperties.description: "Listen closely to those deep, distant warnings you feel."
displayProperties.name: Hardy's Journey

displayProperties.description: "I can't tell any one of you what to do. I'm not that wise. Walk your path. You'll know it."
displayProperties.name: Hardy's Steps

displayProperties.description: "In the end we'll be known for something bigger than all of us."
displayProperties.name: Hardy's Orders

displayProperties.description: "We are the last city of Humans. We greet each new year with joy and thanksgiving." —Tyra Karn
displayProperties.name: Winterhart Helm

displayProperties.description: "No light ever truly goes out." —Lady Jolder
displayProperties.name: Winterhart Gauntlets

displayProperties.description: "The nights are long and cold. We must take care of each other." —Tyra Karn
displayProperties.name: Winterhart Plate

displayProperties.description: "We don't have much, but what we have we share. If we don't, we will die." —Tyra Karn
displayProperties.name: Winterhart Greaves

displayProperties.description: "The sun does arise, and make happy the skies." —Pre-Golden Age poetry
displayProperties.name: Winterhart Mark

displayProperties.description: Keep each other warm.
displayProperties.name: Quilted Winter Mark

displayProperties.description: Scholars disagree on whether the mythical dragonfly ever really existed.

displayProperties.name: Dragonfly Regalia Mark

displayProperties.name: Lustrous Chromite Helm

displayProperties.description: These arms will never tremble.
displayProperties.name: Lustrous Chromite Gauntlets

displayProperties.description: The ticking of this heart can be heard across the battlefield.

displayProperties.description: The squeaky legs always get their grease.
displayProperties.name: Lustrous Chromite Greaves

displayProperties.description: No tears will be shed. No amount of darkness can stop this light.

displayProperties.description: "I said 'use your head!' and then she… well, I think you get it." —Pahanin
displayProperties.name: Star-Crossed Helm

displayProperties.description: "Told my new recruits about your fisticuffs in Meridian Bay. One of 'em didn't believe me. Wanna give him a talking to?" —Holborn to Wei Ning
displayProperties.name: Star-Crossed Fists

displayProperties.description: "Embrace the cold touch of Winter, for Spring is on her heels." —Dark Age proverb

displayProperties.description: As many ways to celebrate the Dawning as stars in the sky. But they all guide us in the dark.

displayProperties.description: "It is our burden to bear. It never gets easier. But we must carry it." —Zavala

displayProperties.description: "It is fuel. Use it to fight harder." —Lord Shaxx
displayProperties.name: Vigil of Heroes

displayProperties.description: "I have foreseen the apex of your fighting potential. Should you wish it, this system shall fall and make way for what's coming. O champion mine." —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Opulent Duelist Greaves

displayProperties.description: "I have foreseen the end of all things. The novenary, the Awoken Queen, the sad, strange little man on his rickety boat. They believe they've seen the same. What they don't know will destroy them." —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Opulent Duelist Mark

displayProperties.description: "The shining halls of peace have been torn down and turned into the battered plate of war."
displayProperties.name: Terra Concord Helm

2669513122.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: "Use your surroundings, they said. Don't think they meant 'build armor out of a crashed space base,' but here we are."
displayProperties.name: Terra Concord Fists

2969017293.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: "Peace is achievable. How do I know? We have achieved it before."
displayProperties.name: Terra Concord Plate

30770203.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description:
"Earth's destiny is to move beyond the Earth."

"It was. Now we turn space stations into battle armor."
displayProperties.name: Terra Concord Greaves

207102915.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: The orbital city of Caer Lerion was one of Earth's crowning achievements in the Golden Age.
displayProperties.name: Terra Concord Mark

1571187476.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: She found them in Juno Chasma. A base—no, an exhibit. The humans didn't know they were in cages.
displayProperties.name: Mimetic Savior Helm

3901581509.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: "They don't know about the Vex. They don't know they're being watched." —Isidel Brandor, to her Ghost
displayProperties.name: Mimetic Savior Gauntlets

4041501730.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description:
"I'm here to save you." —Isidel Brandor
"Imitate! Observe! Comprehend!" —Unnamed inhabitant(s), Juno Chasma
displayProperties.name: Mimetic Savior Plate

166783438.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: Isidel hoisted herself back up over the chasma edge, turned to help the man behind her. But he was gone. Everyone was gone. The chasma was empty.
displayProperties.name: Mimetic Savior Greaves

1857144160.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: Then she remembered. The fireteam. The gate. The desperate plan. "Tuyet! Pull me out!" No response.
displayProperties.name: Mimetic Savior Bond

1427033209.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: When your enemies behold your power, let them know fear. Turn your gaze to them and let them know death.
displayProperties.name: Insight Unyielding Helm

2306661008.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: Are you the immovable force, or the unstoppable object?
displayProperties.name: Insight Unyielding Gauntlets

2202913979.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: Everything ends. When you meet yours, take them all with you.
displayProperties.name: Insight Unyielding Plate

1753332557.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: Glide across the battlefield like a ghost among living corpses.
displayProperties.name: Insight Unyielding Greaves

2737783937.sourceString: Source: Open Legendary engrams and earn faction rank-up packages.

displayProperties.description: The unlikely champion rises from tragedy.

displayProperties.description: “How does one convince a creature of pure, sentient energy to pledge her loyalty? The agency to leave home is intoxicating for anyone.” — Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
displayProperties.name: Mask of the Fulminator

displayProperties.description: “Before my Councilors and I could finalize her containment armor, the very presence of the Fulminator assaulted the senses. She was breathtaking.” —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
displayProperties.name: Wraps of the Fulminator

displayProperties.description: “The Councilors devised a way for the Fulminator to escape her interstellar ark, to the outrage of her people.” —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
displayProperties.name: Robes of the Fulminator

displayProperties.description: “What was she? A creature of the Light? Or the other end of the spectrum? The Councilors never finished their analysis.” —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
displayProperties.name: Boots of the Fulminator

displayProperties.description: “The Fulminator could directly afflict the nervous system of the organics around her. She was pain in all its shades. I will miss her.” —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
displayProperties.name: Shadow's Bond

displayProperties.description: Are you just a phantom in a mirror?
displayProperties.name: Headpiece of the Emperor's Minister

displayProperties.description: There is nothing I cannot forgive.
displayProperties.name: Wraps of the Emperor's Minister

displayProperties.description: Repentance has its rewards.
displayProperties.name: Robes of the Emperor's Minister

displayProperties.description: It's all for the sake of appearances.
displayProperties.name: Boots of the Emperor's Minister

displayProperties.description: For the Warlock possessed of Ghaul's wisdom.
displayProperties.name: Bond of the Emperor's Minister

displayProperties.description: "Five Lights. Too many to fight. I loosed web grenades and fled." —Sekris, Baron of Shanks
displayProperties.name: Mask of Sekris

689582296.sourceString: Source: Leviathan, Eater of Worlds raid lair.

displayProperties.description: "My stealth skin kept me secret. I just watched. To my dismay, the dead Light stood up. Shook himself off." —Sekris, Baron of Shanks
displayProperties.name: Wraps of Sekris

48440323.sourceString: Source: Leviathan, Eater of Worlds raid lair.

displayProperties.description: "There was a sixth Light. He cut me and I cut him, but I had more arms. He fell in pieces." —Sekris, Baron of Shanks
displayProperties.name: Robes of Sekris

3631963045.sourceString: Source: Leviathan, Eater of Worlds raid lair.

displayProperties.description: "The fiercest Light emerged from the tangle of the web grenade. The amethyst divider on his helmet gleamed with rage. I was gone by then. I'm no fool." —Sekris, Baron of Shanks
displayProperties.name: Boots of Sekris

2225603785.sourceString: Source: Leviathan, Eater of Worlds raid lair.

displayProperties.description: "I never forgot what I saw—the gift the Great Machine could bestow. And Calus promised me more." —Sekris, Baron of Shanks
displayProperties.name: Bond of Sekris

371763418.sourceString: Source: Leviathan, Eater of Worlds raid lair.

displayProperties.description: Complete the Throne of Calus challenge to unlock and equip this ornament.
displayProperties.name: Eater of Worlds Ornament

displayProperties.description: Complete the Pleasure Gardens Challenge to unlock and equip this ornament.
displayProperties.name: Eater of Worlds Ornament

displayProperties.description: Complete the Royal Pools Challenge to unlock and equip this ornament.
displayProperties.name: Eater of Worlds Ornament

displayProperties.description: Complete the Gauntlet challenge to unlock and equip this ornament.
displayProperties.name: Eater of Worlds Ornament

displayProperties.description: Complete "Leviathan, Eater of Worlds" on Prestige difficulty to unlock and equip this ornament.
displayProperties.name: Eater of Worlds Ornament

displayProperties.description: "You have truly grown fat from strength. And you are still as wise as ever. Magnificent." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
displayProperties.name: Insigne Shade Cover

2477594294.sourceString: Source: Leviathan, Spire of Stars raid lair.

displayProperties.description: "Warrior-scholars. Reality breakers. Weapons of mass destruction. Your tribe would make stunning Shadows." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
displayProperties.name: Insigne Shade Gloves

3173361545.sourceString: Source: Leviathan, Spire of Stars raid lair.

displayProperties.description: A little bolder. A little more focus. You are almost ready… to cast a Shadow. —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
displayProperties.name: Insigne Shade Robes

3078708807.sourceString: Source: Leviathan, Spire of Stars raid lair.

displayProperties.description: "There has only ever been but a single Shadow from each people I've encountered. Yet there are so many Lights, and I have so little time…" —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal.
displayProperties.name: Insigne Shade Boots

1599672047.sourceString: Source: Leviathan, Spire of Stars raid lair.

displayProperties.description: "This serves as a message to all false Cabal that you have served me. They won't show it, but they fear you. And they should." —Calus, Emperor of the Cabal
displayProperties.name: Insigne Shade Bond

2043941160.sourceString: Source: Leviathan, Spire of Stars raid lair.

displayProperties.description: Complete the Throne of Calus challenge to unlock and equip this ornament.
displayProperties.name: Praetorian Ornament

displayProperties.description: Complete the Pleasure Gardens challenge to unlock and equip this ornament.
displayProperties.name: Praetorian Ornament

displayProperties.name: Praetorian Ornament

displayProperties.name: Praetorian Ornament
