displayProperties.name: Praetorian Ornament

displayProperties.description: I wish to be wise.
displayProperties.name: Hood of the Great Hunt

displayProperties.description: I wish to be lethal.
displayProperties.name: Gloves of the Great Hunt

displayProperties.description: I wish to be ruthless.
displayProperties.name: Robes of the Great Hunt

displayProperties.description: I wish to be sure-footed.
displayProperties.name: Boots of the Great Hunt

displayProperties.description: I wish to be respected.
displayProperties.name: Bond of the Great Hunt

displayProperties.description: "The human condition pushes us. Moves us. We fight because we love. We die because we love." —H. Meyrin
displayProperties.name: Gunsmith's Devotion Crown

693621253.sourceString: Source: Found in the "Scourge of the Past" raid.

displayProperties.description: "What we did, we did for humanity. For family." —H. Meyrin
displayProperties.name: Gunsmith's Devotion Gloves

792068194.sourceString: Source: Found in the "Scourge of the Past" raid.

displayProperties.description: "Black market arms aren't a particularly popular subject, for obvious reasons. Some nights I lie in bed wondering if we're doing the right thing at all." —H. Meyrin
displayProperties.name: Gunsmith's Devotion Robes

1217801230.sourceString: Source: Found in the "Scourge of the Past" raid.

displayProperties.description: "They came for us. We were not prepared. Despite our best attempts." —H. Meyrin
displayProperties.name: Gunsmith's Devotion Boots

2902677664.sourceString: Source: Found in the "Scourge of the Past" raid.

displayProperties.description: "First the Traveler, and then what? What follows in its wake? We must be prepared." —H. Meyrin
displayProperties.name: Gunsmith's Devotion Bond

2519627705.sourceString: Source: Found in the "Scourge of the Past" raid.

displayProperties.description: "The mysteries of the universe lie before you. Unresolved. Threatening. You and I will face them together. As true Cabal." —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Shadow's Mind

4182571722.sourceString: Acquired from the raid "Crown of Sorrow."

displayProperties.description: "With my knowledge of the future and all that you've seen and done… The wisdom borne of it… What can stop us at the end of all things?" —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Shadow's Gloves

2865793685.sourceString: Acquired from the raid "Crown of Sorrow."

displayProperties.description: "Nothing. Nothing can stop us. You and I are pillars of this existence, and shall be until all comes crashing down." —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Shadow's Robes

1792411443.sourceString: Acquired from the raid "Crown of Sorrow."

displayProperties.description: "The task before us is staggering. We must unite all races and creeds. We shall win them to our side with words where we can. And with your Light where we cannot." —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Shadow's Boots

688073643.sourceString: Acquired from the raid "Crown of Sorrow."

displayProperties.description: "For when the end comes, you and I shall welcome it. And all our good works will bear fruit. At last—the right to be last." —Emperor Calus
displayProperties.name: Penumbral Bond

2785499244.sourceString: Acquired from the raid "Crown of Sorrow."

displayProperties.description: A good hood keeps you focused. This one targets nothing but loss.
displayProperties.name: Damaged Warlock Hood

2248272410.sourceString: Source: Earned over the course of the Red War campaign.

displayProperties.description: You've got nothing up your sleeve.  Anymore.
displayProperties.name: Damaged Warlock Gloves

2010381861.sourceString: Source: Earned over the course of the Red War campaign.

displayProperties.description: Thin are the raiments that do not bathe in the Light of the Traveler.
displayProperties.name: Damaged Warlock Robe

1411053539.sourceString: Source: Earned over the course of the Red War campaign.

displayProperties.description: You have never felt so far away from the stars.
displayProperties.name: Damaged Warlock Boots

4122509339.sourceString: Source: Earned over the course of the Red War campaign.

displayProperties.description: A shattered bond marks a broken promise.
displayProperties.name: Shattered Warlock Bond

2445717788.sourceString: Source: Earned over the course of the Red War campaign.

displayProperties.description: Adapt or die. It's a core truth of the universe.
displayProperties.name: Refugee Helm

displayProperties.description: The quest for answers drives you onward.
displayProperties.name: Refugee Gloves

displayProperties.description: None of your books ever said anything about this.
displayProperties.name: Refugee Vest

displayProperties.description: Don't be afraid to lose your way. Sometimes that's the only way to get where you need to go.
displayProperties.name: Refugee Boots

displayProperties.description: All you have left is your mind. And, all things considered, that's not too bad.
displayProperties.name: Bond of Refuge

displayProperties.description: Shed all you know. Seek answers beyond the Light.
displayProperties.name: Aspirant Helm

displayProperties.description: Truth is always within reach.
displayProperties.name: Aspirant Gloves

displayProperties.description: Wrap yourself in nothing more than cloth and find the power within.
displayProperties.name: Aspirant Robes

displayProperties.description: Go now. Answers await.
displayProperties.name: Aspirant Boots

displayProperties.description: Wander until you find the Light or the Light finds you.
displayProperties.name: Bond of Insight

displayProperties.description: "Without Light to sustain it, this body of mine cannot make the pilgrimage to the Shard. But you can." —Tyra Karn
displayProperties.name: Dreamer's Bond

3032355499.sourceString: Source: Earned over the course of the Red War campaign.

displayProperties.description: This cannot go unchallenged.
displayProperties.name: Cry Defiance

displayProperties.description: By our works we are remembered.
displayProperties.name: Cry Defiance

displayProperties.description: "The Traveler trusted us to carry on her task." —The Stoic
displayProperties.name: Cry Defiance

displayProperties.description: They took our City, but they could not take our will to act.
displayProperties.name: Cry Defiance

displayProperties.description: By this bond I seal my fate. I will reclaim our home.
displayProperties.name: Rite of Refusal

displayProperties.description: When a Warlock wears this helmet, it's bigger on the inside than it is on the outside.
displayProperties.name: Vector Home

displayProperties.description: Warlocks should refrain from "hilariously" vaporizing friends until Ghosts can prove they've regained their full strength.
displayProperties.name: Vector Home

displayProperties.description: Hunters donated their neural bezoars as makeshift control systems for this new Warlock fieldweave.
displayProperties.name: Vector Home

displayProperties.description: Be prepared to walk through ash and flame.
displayProperties.name: Vector Home

displayProperties.description: Never lose sight of your path.
displayProperties.name: Homeward

displayProperties.description: Hope burns brightest among broken things.
displayProperties.name: Raven Shard

displayProperties.description: Remember what Ikora Rey would say: Beginnings don't matter. It's endings that count.
displayProperties.name: Raven Shard

displayProperties.description: A Guardian is a dead thing remade into a weapon of light. What has fallen may yet rise.
displayProperties.name: Raven Shard

displayProperties.description: Far from home I bear this pale flame. Far from my birth I walk this burning road.
displayProperties.name: Raven Shard

displayProperties.description:
"The ravens come for our lost souls."

"No, you Exo prat—they've come because you're shiny."
displayProperties.name: Bond of the Raven Shard

displayProperties.description: It is a Warlock's duty to carry the seeds of life where they are most needed.
displayProperties.name: Cosmic Wind

displayProperties.description: "How does Light make you tougher? Bullets strike your armor and then decide they didn't."
displayProperties.name: Cosmic Wind

displayProperties.description: Do not let confusion lead you astray. Wear it like a crest of honor.
displayProperties.name: Cosmic Wind III

displayProperties.description: Experimental guardianists speak of "levels," breakpoints in Guardian skill, and resilience.
displayProperties.name: Cosmic Wind III

displayProperties.description: "The Light alters us, yet all that we do with our Light alters the Light. Thus, there is symmetry." —Ulan-Tan
displayProperties.name: Bond of Symmetry

displayProperties.description: Do not suffer mysteries to remain unsolved.
displayProperties.name: Chiron's Cure

displayProperties.description: If knowledge is the coin that buys tomorrow, seek it.
displayProperties.name: Chiron's Cure

displayProperties.description: The act of understanding is not a weapon. But the application of understanding is that which ends wars.
displayProperties.name: Chiron's Cure

displayProperties.description: Knowledge is a responsibility.
displayProperties.name: Chiron's Cure

displayProperties.description: Change is the way of things.
displayProperties.name: Bond of Chiron

displayProperties.description: Look inside to see how far you've come and to know how far you have yet to go.
displayProperties.name: Farseeker's Casque

displayProperties.description: Nothing is beyond the reach of an open mind.
displayProperties.name: Farseeker's Reach

displayProperties.description: You will know your rightful place long before you find it.
displayProperties.name: Farseeker's Intuition

displayProperties.description: When you have gone your farthest, you have not gone far enough.
displayProperties.name: Farseeker's March

displayProperties.description: Do not be satisfied with the here and now, for here is simply a new beginning and now… is already gone.
displayProperties.name: Stagnatious Rebuke

displayProperties.description: "We can't beat what we don't understand. Then again, we have beaten a lot of Vex." —Ikora Rey
displayProperties.name: Atonement Tau

displayProperties.description: THE DISTANT FIRE: Cabal dirge, age circa 1200 years, narrating the life of a spark from a forge.
displayProperties.name: Atonement Tau

displayProperties.description: Down the eons they come to test us: gods and cosmic intellects, vandals and mighty empires.
displayProperties.name: Atonement Tau

displayProperties.description: Trace the ancient course of cosmic civilizations. You will, inevitably, arrive at the Traveler.
displayProperties.name: Atonement Tau

displayProperties.description: Great galactic powers journey to Earth to find their destiny (which is disintegration by Nova Bomb).
displayProperties.name: Fatum Praevaricator

displayProperties.description: Awoken say they feel a sense of terrible loneliness within the helm… a ghost in the mesh.
displayProperties.name: Prophet Snow

displayProperties.description: Have you ever felt your hand act of its own accord? Never? We can fix that.
displayProperties.name: Prophet Snow

displayProperties.description: Exo dreams: bodies in ice. Bodies falling like meteors. Worlds of panic, fever, hypnagogia.
displayProperties.name: Prophet Snow

displayProperties.description: To be an Exo is to forget. But sometimes there are clues in the shapes of the holes…
displayProperties.name: Prophet Snow

displayProperties.description: When the mind feels threatened, amnesia is one of its most stalwart defenses.
displayProperties.name: Bond of Forgotten Wars

displayProperties.description: "They're powered by that Hive rock you got me! Sloane gave me permission once I explained the voltmeter readings." —Amanda Holliday
displayProperties.name: Songbreaker Gloves

2754601998.sourceString: Source: Adventure "Siren Song" on Saturn's moon, Titan.

displayProperties.description: "I dunno what's more fun: Stealing enemy vehicles, or blowing them up." —Hawthorne
displayProperties.name: Gearhead Gloves

2754601999.sourceString: Source: Adventure "Unsafe at Any Speed" in the European Dead Zone.

displayProperties.description: "Another successful mission accomplished, Captain!" —Failsafe
displayProperties.name: Shieldbreaker Robes

displayProperties.description: "Your work today was more than acceptable. It was adequate." —Asher Mir
displayProperties.name: Mindbreaker Boots

displayProperties.description: "I've seen experiments like this before. My crew.... I don't want to talk about it." —Failsafe
displayProperties.name: Unethical Experiments Bond

displayProperties.description: "You made the right choice. I think. Either way, I'm on your side." —Ghost
displayProperties.name: Orobas Vectura Bond

2696408469.sourceString: Source: Adventure "Red Legion, Black Oil" in the European Dead Zone.

displayProperties.description: "Isolation is not good for the Arach. Our enemies often accuse us of madness, and we cannot give them grounds. One must trust others." —The Book of Departures, Canto III
displayProperties.name: Anti-Extinction Hood

1663538959.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Arach Jalaal.

displayProperties.description: "The possibility of return is slender but present. That, however, is a decision for the future." —The Book of Departures, Canto VII
displayProperties.name: Anti-Extinction Gloves

2341034660.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Arach Jalaal.

displayProperties.description: "We are not a faction but a movement. At heart, we desire survival for all. This point is poorly understood." —The Book of Departures, Canto XII
displayProperties.name: Anti-Extinction Robes

1523276924.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Arach Jalaal.

displayProperties.description: "The role of Arach is not a gift, not an honor, but a curse and a pledge of service. Many seek it nevertheless." —The Book of Departures, Canto I
displayProperties.name: Anti-Extinction Boots

3604886482.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Arach Jalaal.

displayProperties.description: "At the point of decision, the Arach must lead us to safety in the midst of the unknown." —The Book of Departures, Canto II
displayProperties.name: Stella Incognita Bond

2557941139.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Arach Jalaal.

displayProperties.description: Complete a Nightfall strike wearing full Dead Orbit armor and while pledged to that faction to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Anti-Extinction Mask, Helm, and Hood.
displayProperties.name: Extinction Orbit Ornament

displayProperties.description: Complete Lost Sectors off Earth while pledged to Dead Orbit to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Anti-Extinction Grasps, Gauntlets, and Gloves.
displayProperties.name: Extinction Orbit Ornament

displayProperties.description: Get precision kills while pledged to Dead Orbit to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Anti-Extinction Vest, Plate, and Robes.
displayProperties.name: Extinction Orbit Ornament

displayProperties.description: Get melee kills off Earth while pledged to Dead Orbit to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Anti-Extinction Legs, Greaves, and Boots.
displayProperties.name: Extinction Orbit Ornament

displayProperties.description: Claim Dead Orbit reward engrams in Season 2 to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Stella Incognita Cloak, Mark, and Bond.
displayProperties.name: Extinction Orbit Ornament

displayProperties.description: Spend Renown by looting a Lost Sector cache while pledged to Dead Orbit.
displayProperties.name: Arach's Chosen Veil

displayProperties.description: Get Fallen precision kills while pledged to Dead Orbit.
displayProperties.name: Arach's Chosen Gloves

displayProperties.description: Claim high-value targets' chests with full Dead Orbit Anti-Extinction armor equipped and while pledged to Dead Orbit.
displayProperties.name: Arach's Chosen Robes

displayProperties.description: Earn Renown with full Dead Orbit Anti-Extinction armor equipped and while pledged to Dead Orbit.
displayProperties.name: Arach's Chosen Boots

displayProperties.description: While pledged to Dead Orbit, complete the Carrion Pit Lost Sector in the Glade of Echoes on Nessus.
displayProperties.name: Bond of Last Departure

displayProperties.description: "Her back is always turned to us. It's almost as if she knows we're watching." —RECORD 459-CHASM-1002
displayProperties.name: Simulator Hood

3441347365.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Lakshmi-2.

displayProperties.description: "I see a submerged Earth. I see humanity in crude boats, battered, drifting. I see them fight what rises from the deeps. Fight and win." —RECORD 463-CHASM-3102
displayProperties.name: Simulator Gloves

3581370754.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Lakshmi-2.

displayProperties.description: "She just fainted? Didn't say anything? No, 'great wyrm' doesn't mean anything to me."  —RECORD 462-CHASM-3103
displayProperties.name: Simulator Robes

986732974.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Lakshmi-2.

displayProperties.description: "Many Ghosts, whispering like a stream. I walked among them, listening, but could not understand." —RECORD 460-CHASM-1022
displayProperties.name: Simulator Legs

1397013184.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Lakshmi-2.

displayProperties.description: "A dazzling flash. Blinding. All-consuming. I saw nothing more." —RECORD 460-CHASM-1004
displayProperties.name: Entanglement Bond

2246982745.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Lakshmi-2.

displayProperties.description: Complete a Nightfall strike wearing full FWC armor and while pledged to that faction to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Simulator Mask, Helm, and Hood.
displayProperties.name: War Simulator Ornament

displayProperties.description: Complete public events while pledged to FWC to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Simulator Grips, Gauntlets, and Gloves.
displayProperties.name: War Simulator Ornament

displayProperties.description: Get Power weapon kills while pledged to FWC to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Simulator Vest, Plate, and Robes.
displayProperties.name: War Simulator Ornament

displayProperties.description: Get grenade kills in strikes while pledged to FWC to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Simulator Boots, Greaves, and Legs.
displayProperties.name: War Simulator Ornament

displayProperties.description: Claim Future War Cult reward engrams in Season 2 to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Entanglement Cloak, Mark, and Bond.
displayProperties.name: War Simulator Ornament

displayProperties.description: Spend Renown by looting a Lost Sector cache while pledged to Future War Cult.
displayProperties.name: Superior's Vision Hood

displayProperties.description: Eliminate Vex with Nova Bombs while pledged to Future War Cult.
displayProperties.name: Superior's Vision Gloves

displayProperties.description: Eliminate Vex with Energy weapons while wearing full Future War Cult Simulator armor and while pledged to Future War Cult.
displayProperties.name: Superior's Vision Robes

displayProperties.description: Earn Renown with full Future War Cult Simulator armor equipped and while pledged to Future War Cult.
displayProperties.name: Superior's Vision Boots

displayProperties.description: While pledged to Future War Cult, complete the Orrery Lost Sector in Artifact's Edge on Nessus.
displayProperties.name: Bond of Eternal War

displayProperties.description: "We pursue an unrealized ideal, but we do so clearly, without illusions." —Laws of the Executors, Vol. 9
displayProperties.name: Sovereign Hood

2345453382.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Executor Hideo.

displayProperties.description: "The hand of the law must fall impartially on the rich and the poor, the powerful and the weak. This is required of both rulers and the Executors who serve them." —Laws of the Executors, Vol. 6
displayProperties.name: Sovereign Gloves

1972675865.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Executor Hideo.

displayProperties.description: "While our wealth is not meant for personal use, we should remember that a taste of luxury can be instructive, even persuasive." —Laws of the Executors, Vol. 13
displayProperties.name: Sovereign Robes

3893771063.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Executor Hideo.

displayProperties.description: "The time to walk away from a poor candidate is before the crown is offered. Executors must test and dismiss many thousands without guarantee of success." —Laws of the Executors, Vol. 10
displayProperties.name: Sovereign Legs

445785759.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Executor Hideo.

displayProperties.description: "The sign of New Monarchy should come to mean comfort, safety, and strength." —Laws of the Executors, Vol. 1
displayProperties.name: Coronation Bond

2859106584.sourceString: Source: Earn rank-up packages from Executor Hideo.

displayProperties.description: Complete a Nightfall strike wearing full New Monarchy armor and while pledged to that faction to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Sovereign Mask, Helm, and Hood.

displayProperties.description: Complete patrols in the EDZ while pledged to New Monarchy to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Sovereign Grips, Gauntlets, and Gloves.
displayProperties.name: Sovereign Lion Ornament

displayProperties.description: Create Orbs of Light while pledged to New Monarchy to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Sovereign Vest, Plate, and Robes.
displayProperties.name: Sovereign Lion Ornament

displayProperties.description: Get Super kills in the EDZ while pledged to New Monarchy to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Sovereign Boots, Greaves, and Legs.
displayProperties.name: Sovereign Lion Ornament

displayProperties.description: Claim New Monarchy reward engrams during Season 2 to earn this ornament. It is unlocked to the Coronation Cloak, Mark, and Bond.

displayProperties.description: "The Vex don't really want to kill you. It's just that one of the by-products of conversion is death. Shame, huh?" —Sagira
displayProperties.name: Omega Mechanos Crown

displayProperties.description: "They want to turn you into data sets. Strip away everything about you that doesn't 'compute' for them."—Sagira
displayProperties.name: Omega Mechanos Gloves

displayProperties.description: "And a version of you would still be alive in a Vex simulation somewhere. So it's only sort of like death, really." —Sagira
displayProperties.name: Omega Mechanos Robes

displayProperties.description: "And Ghosts? I don't think they really understand what we are. Light is pretty hard to simulate. Paracausality and all that." —Sagira
displayProperties.name: Omega Mechanos Boots

displayProperties.description: "Gotta wonder what happened to make the Vex like this, right? I mean, the Vex couldn't have come from nowhere." —Sagira
displayProperties.name: Omega Mechanos Bond

displayProperties.description: "Think. And keep thinking. Stay seven thoughts ahead, always."
displayProperties.name: Mihaylova's Triumph

displayProperties.description: "Ask yourself: what are you reaching for, and what will you do to get it?"
displayProperties.name: Mihaylova's Instruments

displayProperties.description: "Good, bad… we walk around looking like everyone else."
displayProperties.name: Mihaylova's Choice

displayProperties.description: "What you pursue, those are your values. Everything else is noise."
displayProperties.name: Mihaylova's Path

displayProperties.description: "What you fight for is what you value. Everything else is words."
displayProperties.name: Mihaylova's Tale

displayProperties.description: "We are the last city of Humans. We greet each new year with joy and thanksgiving." —Tyra Karn
displayProperties.name: Winterhart Cover

displayProperties.description: "No light ever truly goes out." —Lady Jolder
displayProperties.name: Winterhart Gloves

displayProperties.description: "The nights are long and cold. We must take care of each other." —Tyra Karn
displayProperties.name: Winterhart Robes

displayProperties.description: "We don't have much, but what we have we share. If we don't, we will die." —Tyra Karn
displayProperties.name: Winterhart Boots

displayProperties.description: "The sun does arise, and make happy the skies." —Pre-Golden Age poetry
displayProperties.name: Winterhart Bond

displayProperties.description: Scholars disagree on whether the mythical dragonfly ever really existed.
displayProperties.name: Dragonfly Regalia Mandible

displayProperties.description: Spread your wings and don your sapphire mail.

displayProperties.name: Dragonfly Regalia Boots

displayProperties.description: "These planets we protect were beautiful. They can be again." —Cryptarch Matsuo
displayProperties.name: Dragonfly Regalia Bond

displayProperties.description: "I have seen the edges of eternity. It is full of bloodshed and isolation." —The Journals of Jorin Nal
displayProperties.name: Liminal Voyager Hood

displayProperties.description: "I did not seek the Traveler's gift. It was thrust upon me. Still, I do not shrink from this power—I embrace it." —The Journals of Jorin Nal
displayProperties.name: Liminal Voyager Gloves

displayProperties.description: "It never strays far from my heart. The fear that I am… unworthy." —The Journals of Jorin Nal
displayProperties.name: Liminal Voyager Robes

displayProperties.description: "With every step, I wish I could return to the home I do not recall. But my duty is to fight." —The Journals of Jorin Nal
displayProperties.name: Liminal Voyager Boots

displayProperties.description: "There are whispers among the Warlocks who remain. Whispers of one who has seen the future in death." —The Journals of Jorin Nal
displayProperties.name: Liminal Voyager Bond

displayProperties.description: "You do not hate me. You hate the idea that I might be right." —Ulan-Tan
displayProperties.name: Symmetrists' Mask

displayProperties.description: "One day you will realize… Light alone is not enough." —Ulan-Tan
displayProperties.name: Symmetrists' Palms

displayProperties.description: "I wish the Light could 'win,' as you put it. But we must accept that it's just not that simple." —Ulan-Tan
displayProperties.name: Symmetrists' Habit

displayProperties.description: "Whatever came for us… it will come again. That is the nature of symmetry." —Ulan-Tan
displayProperties.name: Symmetrists' Balance

displayProperties.description: "In the darkness, light shines more brightly, and where light shines, it casts a shadow." —Ulan-Tan
displayProperties.name: Bond of Reciprocity

displayProperties.description: "During the Festival of the Lost, we look back. During the Dawning, we look forward." —Ikora Rey
displayProperties.name: Frostreach Hood

displayProperties.description: "We welcome the Dawning of a new year with hearts open and arms outstretched." —Eva Levante
displayProperties.name: Frostreach Gloves

displayProperties.description: The Dawning's familiar warmth can thaw even the coldest of hearts.
displayProperties.name: Frostreach Robes

displayProperties.description: "Embrace the cold touch of Winter, for Spring is on her heels." —Dark Age proverb
displayProperties.name: Frostreach Boots

displayProperties.description: As many ways to celebrate the Dawning as stars in the sky. But they all guide us in the dark.
displayProperties.name: Frostreach Bond

displayProperties.description: "Light isn't power. Light isn't magic. It's a skill. Be unthoughtful in its use and you will fail every time." —Warlock Aunor Mahal.
displayProperties.name: Mantle of the Cormorant Blade

displayProperties.description: "A Praxic blade could set the world on fire. We're very careful with our aim." —Warlock Aunor Mahal
displayProperties.name: Gloves of the Cormorant Blade

displayProperties.description: "The dark compels the Hive and the Taken to sacrifice for it, worship it. The Traveler enables us to live."—Warlock Aunor Mahal
displayProperties.name: Duster of the Cormorant Blade

displayProperties.description: "The Hidden are everywhere. You might know one or two." —Warlock Aunor Mahal
displayProperties.name: Boots of the Cormorant Blade

displayProperties.description: "Paperwork." —Warlock Aunor Mahal, on the most devastating adversary of her Praxic career.
displayProperties.name: Bond of the Cormorant Blade

displayProperties.description: Designed for the seamless delivery of justice in an unjust world.

2471990488.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

2471990491.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: Pardon me. Coming through.

2471990490.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: Do you believe in the Gaiaforms, the energies within planets?

2471990493.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: Victory from on high.
displayProperties.name: Peregrine Greaves

657854178.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: Reality is the finest flesh, oh bearer mine. And are you not…hungry?
displayProperties.name: Skull of Dire Ahamkara

846189255.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: Mighty are they of the stormcloud thrones, and quick to anger, but bounteous to those whom they love.
displayProperties.name: Crown of Tempests

846189254.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: When the universe conspires, its enemies cannot hide.
displayProperties.name: Eye of Another World

846189253.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: "He is that which is an end. And he shall rise again." —passage from Of Hated Nezarec, a pre-Golden Age text.
displayProperties.name: Nezarec's Sin

846189252.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: Only bones for your feast. Only death for my victory.
displayProperties.name: The Stag

846189251.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description:
"The Hive do not see how we see. They look beyond, into the infinite. Into the dark."

—Eris Morn
displayProperties.name: Verity's Brow

846189250.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: Most helmets protect the mind from the universe. Not this one.
displayProperties.name: Apotheosis Veil

846189249.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: The ideocosm contained within this helm transforms the wearer's head from flesh and/or exoneurons to the pure, raw stuff of thought.
displayProperties.name: Astrocyte Verse

4659035.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: "When one can wield the fire of stars, what use is flesh and bone?"
displayProperties.name: Sunbracers

3087858766.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: “You are mine, you shall be mine, you and I are one for ever.”
displayProperties.name: Karnstein Armlets

3087858767.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: "I know you." —Lord Felwinter
displayProperties.name: Winter's Guile

3087858764.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: "We are unique emanations of the same shared Light." —Cult of the Aeons
displayProperties.name: Aeon Soul

3087858765.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: "Have I the aspic in my lips?"
displayProperties.name: Ophidian Aspect

3087858762.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: The mind is malleable, filled with transient and fleeting ideas. Let us shape it, so that you may see the infinite splendor of the universe.
displayProperties.name: Claws of Ahamkara

3087858763.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: "Nothing is free. I know that. Therefore, he knows it too. If our places were swapped, he would do the same." —Tomek I
displayProperties.name: Contraverse Hold

3087858760.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: Keep the engine running.
displayProperties.name: Getaway Artist

3746353540.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: 13.4 billion years ago, the first stars kindled out of darkness, seeding the future of all life.
displayProperties.name: Starfire Protocol

860077154.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: There will come a day when the light will never fade.
displayProperties.name: Wings of Sacred Dawn

860077155.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: "Drawn like so, the Rift circle reinscribes planetary energy as a destructive force." —Ikora Rey, "On Circles, Volume 12"
displayProperties.name: Vesper of Radius

860077152.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: "…found them… Crystal Orchards of Dione… requesting backup… coordinates to follow…" —Last transmission of Fireteam Pergamon

860077158.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: Do not grieve the dying star. Its death kindles newer life, and thus the wheel turns again.
displayProperties.name: Phoenix Protocol

860077159.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: There is power in blood.
displayProperties.name: Sanguine Alchemy

860077153.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: Your relationship with consistent spacetime is...tenuous at best.
displayProperties.name: Transversive Steps

875969608.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: "I thank you for the gift of these atoms. I will use them well." —The Stoic
displayProperties.name: Lunafaction Boots

875969609.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: "The hurricane will overtake you. It's inevitable. Take stability where you can get it." —Ikora Rey
displayProperties.name: Geomag Stabilizers

875969610.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: "…I love my job."
displayProperties.name: Sweet Business

564802917.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: These ancient ceremonial pistols can be dated back to the early Golden Age. A faded inscription reads, "To Sigrun, from Victor."

displayProperties.description: "The eye remains open. The Lighthouse remains lit." —Brother Vance

564802919.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: We are small, but we are legion.

displayProperties.description: Select application: Ballistic engagement. Entrenching tool. Avionics trawl. Troll smasher. Stellar sextant. List continues.

displayProperties.description: According to official Vanguard policy, this weapon does not exist.

564802912.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: "What kind of harebrained scheme have you got in mind this time?"

564802915.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: Nothin' in the world that 30 rounds can't solve.

564802914.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: Nostalgia as a weapon of war. Style as a hallmark of victory.

564802925.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: "Because three heads are good, but four are better." —Jeza "Jeopardy" Verlayn
displayProperties.name: Cerberus+1

564802924.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: "Don't fret. It's a simple expedition. We'll be back before lunch." —Sjur Eido, First Queen's Wrath
displayProperties.name: Wish-Ender

1660030044.sourceString: Source: An Exotic quest or challenge.

displayProperties.description: "Nothing kills a Guardian faster than another Guardian." —The Drifter
displayProperties.name: Malfeasance

1660030045.sourceString: Source: An Exotic quest or challenge.

displayProperties.description: "Folding was never an option." —Cayde-6
displayProperties.name: Ace of Spades

1660030046.sourceString: Source: An Exotic quest or challenge.

displayProperties.description: "My mother had a shotgun we called the Chaperone. Kept us alive out there before we got to the City." —Amanda Holliday
displayProperties.name: The Chaperone

1660030047.sourceString: Source: An Exotic quest or challenge.

displayProperties.description: "Shame. Guilt. Fear. We all bear them. Gather your regrets, purge them as best you can. Let your enemies feel the weight of your burdens." —Ada-1
displayProperties.name: Izanagi's Burden

24541428.sourceString: Source: An Exotic quest or challenge.

displayProperties.description: "Yours, until the last flame dies and all words have been spoken." —Shin Malphur to you, as you journey forth into the unknown
displayProperties.name: The Last Word

3074058273.sourceString: Source: An Exotic quest or challenge.

displayProperties.description: "We didn't have linear fusions in the Dark Age. But we made it work." —The Drifter
displayProperties.name: Arbalest

2036397919.sourceString: Source: Exotic engrams; extremely rare world drops.

displayProperties.description: "To rend one's enemies is to see them not as equals, but objects—hollow of spirit and meaning." —13th Understanding, 7th Book of Sorrow
displayProperties.name: Thorn

displayProperties.description: ~directive = KILL while enemies = PRESENT: execute(directive)~
